name: Harbinger's Horse GT
description:
Based on the Harbinger's Horse GT cover from Mel Tow.

Beat your rival racer by ending his race career forever! We hope you have fun playing our short game! 

- Jelle & Jamie

Controls

Left: A

Right: D

Radio (change music): R

Pause: Escape

Known Issues

  • Driving speed of cars is a bit random making some maneuvers on very rare occasions impossible
  • The rival sometimes drives through obstacles

Credits

  • Made with Unity
  • Sounds from FreeSounds.org
